snippet: Thank you so much for the online invitation - but which of my children did you mean to invite? With kids close in age, and online invitations addressed to parents only, who knows?
abstract: Thank you so much for the online invitation - but which of my children did you mean to invite? With kids close in age, and online invitations addressed to parents only, who knows?

headline.main: The Peril of Online Invitations: Who's Invited?
